events.message: Customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle on Main Street during morning rush hour.
Claim was categorised as Auto Accident based on the initial accident details submitted by the customer.
A claims agent specializing in vehicular accidents was assigned promptly to handle the customer's case.
Customer was sent an official acknowledgment confirming the receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps.
The agent requested submission of the vehicle registration, accident photos, and police report for investigation.
Customer provided all requested documentation including detailed photos of the car damage and official police report.
Investigation began to verify damages and assess liability related to the reported vehicle collision.
Investigation concluded with a full assessment report confirming the customer's claim and damage extent.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover the repair costs based on the investigation and policy coverage.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciation for the timely communication.
The claim was formally approved following customer agreement to the settlement terms and conditions.
Payment for the approved settlement was issued directly to the customerâ€™s bank account without delay.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed after payment was transferred and customer confirmation received.
All claim files and documents were archived for record-keeping following the case closure procedures.
